attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Kelvin is a star.  Talks more sense than most other media hacks and definitely more sense than any politician.  He has views and opinions that I'm sure will be in accord with most sensible people in this country.  Give him some recognition.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
